title: DENTAL TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' level credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics
subjects: Any three (3) of Mathematics, Chemistry, Physics, Biology

title: DENTAL THERAPY
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' level credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics.
subjects: Any three (3) of Mathematics, Chemistry, Physics, Biology/Health Sciences or Food and Nutrition

title: HEALTH INFORMATION MANAGEMENT
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, English Language, Biology/Health Science and any two (2) from Chemistry, Physics, Geography, Economics, Religious Knowledge, Nigerian Language.
